website_summaries.verdict: This ladder ball set uses PVC pipes in the targets that allows the set to be sold at a lower price.
pros: Easy to set up and assemble with no tools
Set fits in user-friendly carrying case
Quality of the pieces should last
cons: PVC materials don't look as good as pieces made from steel

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Being that we don’t have a garage for storage, I bought this product with the intent of taking it apart when not in use. It comes with a travel bag so you can take it places so you would have to take it apart for travel. After the 2nd use it cracked in a few places purely from pulling the pieces apart from each other. It is now, after 2 uses, being held together by glue and duct tape and we cannot take it apart anymore. I could see maybe over time this occurring but it was literally right away. Disappointed to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Clements

customer_reviews.title: Fun game with a canvas carry bag for travel
customer_reviews.text: Nice, lightweight set. Easy to transport. Takes a bit to put it together but it is not difficult. A great carry case so you can take it to the beach, park, camping, etc. It’s a lot of fun to play with the kids. My husband and I enjoy playing ladder golf with each other as well.
customer_reviews.author: MommaCX3 ☀️❤️

customer_reviews.title: I would really recommend this game, it's such a great way to get the whole family involved.
customer_reviews.text: I was kind of skeptical of buying this game set at first because honestly it really didn't look that fun, but boy was I wrong! Everyone in the family got involved in playing this game. Everything is very durable and the balls are just perfect consistency. Not hard like gold balls but not so soft you can step on them and they will break. They are filled with some type of sand. Also included is a zip carrying bag, which I thought was great! prefect to put out of the way in storage. I would really recommend this game, it's such a great way to get the whole family involved.
customer_reviews.author: 💋AshleyNicole 💋

customer_reviews.title: Check your pieces before game day and only play in the dirt or grass.
customer_reviews.text: The game itself, is fun. Unfortunately, mine did not come with all the parts to assemble both ladders. There were pieces missing. Of course, I didn't check for all the pieces until we were already camping and went to assemble the game (my fault, usually I check but I was so busy that I forgot). I am going to contact the seller, but haven't yet so I'll update this once I get a response. The good: this product is light weight and it comes with pieces to steak into the ground so the ladder doesn't fall over. The bad: if you're playing on concrete, there's no where to steak this too and it falls, a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Rounds

customer_reviews.title: Fun backyard game for the family or for a party
customer_reviews.text: Fun backyard game for the family or for a party. It entertains for hours and requires more skill than I would have expected. We have also used this item to teach the dogs jumping tricks. We challenge each other to see if we can toss with out swinging. Just loads of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Absolute junk, no quality control, look elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: My son received this for Christmas but because we live in a frozen tundra, we weren't able to use this until April. Upon opening the box we found there was a missing piece so we were down to only one ladder. The PVC is such a poor quality, one of the rungs on the ladder broke the first afternoon we played. Disappointment for the whole family.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Breaks during assembly
customer_reviews.text: On my first attempt to put a pole into a t-connection, a piece of the pole chipped off. Very difficult to fit the poles into the t-connectors. Three connectors cracked as I was pushing the pole in. The holes in the connectors are too small. I do like the score keeper and I know the game is fun so I will enjoy it, provided is lasts for more than just a few games. I hate the thought of paying $50+ for this basic little game, but maybe that is the only way to get something decent.
customer_reviews.author: DMaz

customer_reviews.title: Fun for all but quality could be improved.
customer_reviews.text: Game is fun and easy to put together, but on putting together the 2nd time one the bottom T connectors broke. Can't find how to get a replacement part. Twice balls have come off the strings with just normal play.
customer_reviews.author: OakSky

customer_reviews.title: Bummer missing parts
customer_reviews.text: If all the parts had come with it this would have been great. Carrying case, light weight makes it great for camping or going to the park. Unfortunately it was a Christmas gift so we didn’t unpack it till it was too late for any refunds or extra parts to be sent. We can use 50% of it but two rather important joints were missing.
customer_reviews.author: JClay

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: It’s ok. Definitely NOT on the sturdy side. If you don’t use anchors it flies over so it has to be played in grass. The balls are durable so far. The pipes come undone if hit too hard with the balls. I do like that it comes with a storage bag. I would recommend a higher quality one.
customer_reviews.author: Llong

customer_reviews.title: great for parties
customer_reviews.text: This product came exactly as advertised. it does take a couple minutes to set up because everything comes taken apart (every single connection). and the ground stakes are a little awkward to drive into the ground while connected to the latter. We had lots of fun with it at the party.
customer_reviews.author: trishh12

customer_reviews.title: Different brand and different colors
customer_reviews.text: The one we received was a different brand than what is in this listing. The colors were completely different and the bag was different. To top if off one of the pipes was too skinny and would not fit in the joint. Seems very flimsy even without the loose pipe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s still worth it
customer_reviews.text: It’s fun to play but it’s not study it’s already broken after a few uses . The brackets to hold it in ground are not strong enough and bend while trying to put them into ground with the slightest resistance like hard dirt . It’s fun to play through
customer_reviews.author: CPalmerino

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for picnics
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for a student event at a university and the students loved it. Very easy to assemble and the ground stakes kept it in place during play. The carrying case was a bonus for storing all the parts after use.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: This has been a disappointment as it is too flimsy and comes apart during game play. In addition, one of the balls actually deflated somehow, I thought they were solid because they look sort of like golfballs. Try another brand
customer_reviews.author: D. F.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together but missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together, but came missing several of the "t" connectors so I could only build one ladder. I will be contacting the seller. Edit: it's been a long time because I forgot about this review but I'm updating because seller did replace for free.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Extremely lightweight, sand filled balls are poorly made.
customer_reviews.text: This item is very lightweight and doesn’t stay in place when being used. Also the balls are filled with sand and after using it about 3x, the sealed portion on one set of the balls began to leak the sand. I of course was using it inside so it’s a pain. It’s a decent item.... I wouldn’t buy it again or recommend this particular one.
customer_reviews.author: Latty

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made
customer_reviews.text: A million pieces and the ball fell apart on the first play
customer_reviews.author: Stever

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces.
customer_reviews.text: This game came missing four gray pipes. We had to rig it with things from our garage and prop it up with bricks. Not impressed. Will try to return it.
customer_reviews.author: MissMissy

customer_reviews.title: What a waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This ladder toss game is soooooooo cheaply made that it broke as we were putting it together! 4 of the PVC poles broke as we put them into their fittings. Not impressed at all. We never even got to use it. What a waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good but not sure if I received a new package or simply a returned product repackaged???
customer_reviews.text: I was unsure as to why there was so much sand in a brand new product? As I started to put together there’s sand just all over the bag and the pieces were covered with bits of grass and sand like it had been used previously but I didn’t buy used and then but all the bags were new? It had a plastic seal but as you can see from the picture it was filled with sand.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie apple

customer_reviews.title: Felt cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: This product came with some pieces already cracked. Feels cheap and the colors were dull and not very pretty. The way the strings were tied onto the balls felt very cheaply done too
customer_reviews.author: Moose

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces, but would have been fun
customer_reviews.text: I returned the product after finding that two T-joints were missing. I could not build the second ladder. T-joint fittings from the local hardware store was not compatible since they were slightly larger than the ladder pipes. The assemble ladder worked well and would have been fun to play with had the second ladder been built.
customer_reviews.author: Rabbit L.

customer_reviews.title: not the best quality. It does the job but I would ...
customer_reviews.text: This set is kind of chincy. Very light weight, not the best quality. It does the job but I would have ordered a studier set if I knew.
customer_reviews.author: Aimala

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: These were a lot of fun at party. Inexpensive enough to get 2 sets. One for children and one for adults
customer_reviews.author: RH kerrville

customer_reviews.title: 👎🏽
customer_reviews.text: A lot of assembly, piece everywhere, not very sturdy. I will definitely make my own next time with P.V.C pipe
customer_reviews.author: Jason A Ayala

customer_reviews.title: Thin plastic
customer_reviews.text: Very thin plastic that broke putting it together. Will tip over without using the stakes.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene

customer_reviews.title: Fun game
customer_reviews.text: It’s a fun game, sets up pretty easily with the color coded pieces. Only dislike is you have to retighten it a few times during a game bc it starts to get wonky after a few good tosses.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up, good quality
customer_reviews.text: This was surprisingly easy to assemble! The balls are made well and I can’t wait to play it!
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Great game!
customer_reviews.text: I love this game it was easy to set up and the instructions were easy to read it was my first time playing with my family and they all loved it. If you’re looking for an excellent game to play outside as a family this would be it!
customer_reviews.author: Bessie J Hammon

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE! INCREDIBLY CHEAP PLASTIC!
customer_reviews.text: Elbow joint broke on first day when putting toy together (see photo). Did exactly as the instructions stated. No tools required but still broke when I was inserting the gray straight piece into one of the gray elbow joints. Seriously do not waste your time and cash. Grade F!
customer_reviews.author: Dave S.

customer_reviews.title: Fun, but breaks easily.
customer_reviews.text: While it’s a fun game, we have needed to repair it more than once. Not exactly high quality, but you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Our Fine House

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made. Dont buy!
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with this product. It kept falling apart and the balls fell off the string constantly. It's so annoying. Every time you threw a ball it twisted like a pretzel! Not worth $30.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Eh. Okay..
customer_reviews.text: its smaller than I thought it would be. Not sure it will last long at all- seems frail.
customer_reviews.author: Audrina C.

customer_reviews.title: Is fun to play
customer_reviews.text: This is fun to play it is not very strong but that is ok
customer_reviews.author: C. Ortega

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: This product was very disappointing. Very flimsy plastic rods that did not fit together well. The carrying bag was nice though. Returned immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Cox

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: I received my order put together one part as we were putting together the other one there are missing pieces so I can't put it together.
customer_reviews.author: Venus McCree

customer_reviews.title: Nice enough
customer_reviews.text: Pvc pipes are pretty sturdy. Instructions were the easiest to follow for assembly, but its a nice enough set
customer_reviews.author: Nancy E

customer_reviews.title: Great fun
customer_reviews.text: This game is such fun for all ages. I have to purchased another one so we can have a little tournament.
customer_reviews.author: Jeri

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the whole family
customer_reviews.text: True to description. It was fun for the whole family.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fun
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. It is alot of fun in our backyard or when we go camping. My 8 year old loves this game. Good family fun.
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: Had to mend it right out of the packaging
customer_reviews.text: When the product arrived one of the yellow bolas had a hole in it and leaked sand all over my den. Product is very cheaply made and I wouldn’t recommend it for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Keith

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing, but it'll do.
customer_reviews.text: Super super flimsy. The whole frame twists when the rope wraps around. If you can afford it, make your own out of pvc pipe and golf balls.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: This is a useable beginner set. The pieces do not sit perfectly so it is a little wonky. The balls can be easily dented. I will have to build a set soon when this one falls apart. Save your self the trouble and just run by the hardware store.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fun game! Lots of pieces to put together but easy to piece together .
customer_reviews.author: Liz123

customer_reviews.title: bought for family camping trips absolutely a winner
customer_reviews.text: sturdy, and the kids love it. Did not take it apart after we assembled it, just left the ladders together. good value
customer_reviews.author: Diane Loye

customer_reviews.title: UNIQUE OUTDOOR FUN
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice set of ladder ball. It was easy to assemble and has a useful storage bag to store everything in. Very portable and fun to play.
customer_reviews.author: 3GIRLSMOM

customer_reviews.title: Solid Ladder Toss Set
customer_reviews.text: The entire set came inside of the carrying case. All items were included. The kids were able to set up the system under 10 minutes and were playing with it for the rest of the weekend. A great game for adults and kids.
customer_reviews.author: L. Pino

customer_reviews.title: Great Outdoor Party Game
customer_reviews.text: Great hit at an elopement party!! Even young kids enjoyed it but need adult supervision as the balls could break a window.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Fun game
customer_reviews.text: Love this game, bought it for a Father’s Day gift. Super fun.
customer_reviews.author: Electrosocket

customer_reviews.title: Love this game
customer_reviews.text: We love this game. Excellent fun during quarantine with my husband, myself and 2 college age daughters. We had an issue where a piece was missing, emailed the company, received a response that day,. We received a refund so we could order a replacement set (great customer service).
customer_reviews.author: alzheimers awareness

customer_reviews.title: Yard Fun
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't a fan of how much it took to put this together
customer_reviews.author: Georgia

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Cord on one of the balls came off. And we barely used it. Pieces of the ladder keep coming undone
customer_reviews.author: Britney G.

customer_reviews.title: Returned it
customer_reviews.text: One of the joints was too small compared to the pipe and it cracked the joint. Also very ubstable even once put together. I returned and spent a little more on a metal one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together. Bolas have good weight to them. Occasionally, legs may come loose from playing often, but not enough to ruin the game.
customer_reviews.author: JagotiENT

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun for all ages!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun family game to play with kids or for adults to play! We even brought it to the beach and played it there! Lots of fun and easy to assemble!!
customer_reviews.author: Gwen Carothers

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy
customer_reviews.text: Missing parts can’t use trying to figure out how to get replacement parts
customer_reviews.author: Betty Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: High quality- neat colors!
customer_reviews.text: Purchase a set like this through Amazon instead of going the Walmart route- you wont be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Darrin Paulson

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. This will be a fun game for the entire family to enjoy. Nice construction with a carrying case. I can't wait to play this at out next family reunion.
customer_reviews.author: BA

customer_reviews.title: We have a great time playing this with the grandkids and even the ...
customer_reviews.text: We have a great time playing this with the grandkids and even the older kids have a great time ! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: P. B

customer_reviews.title: Nice carrying case
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't stay together. Very cheaply made. Nice carrying case, though.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel L Walton

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, easy put together ladder golf.
customer_reviews.text: This game is so much fun. We bought it for our camping trips.
customer_reviews.author: B.Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Very light and flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Cheap and easy to put together with several balls included but it’s very light weight and they break easily
customer_reviews.author: CorduroyMagic

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift for camping trips
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to our grandson for Christmas. Their last set broke and they use this when they go camping. He loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Jan H.

customer_reviews.title: Light fun
customer_reviews.text: Great outdoor game. Very easy to put together and very light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Ab Adair

customer_reviews.title: Missing Pieces
customer_reviews.text: My set arrived without the t-pieces to assemble the ladder. I didn't open it until past the return window so I'm not sure there's anything I can do about it now. Otherwise, set appears somewhat flimsy, maybe better for younger players.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Marie Kok

customer_reviews.title: Serves purpose for price
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together great for gaming since has travel bag... not super sturdy but serves purpose ... would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Always falls apart when the rope ball Twirls around the bar
customer_reviews.author: G. Masel

customer_reviews.title: Fun and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and lots of fun. Easy to take with us in the motorhome too!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly S Woodbury

customer_reviews.title: Solid easy to put together with great carry case!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, great carry case, good quality and I won the inaugural game!
customer_reviews.author: Colette

customer_reviews.title: Love ladder toss game!
customer_reviews.text: Who doesn't love ladder toss?! We love this game! It is great for camping or back yard fun.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie J. Fitte

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: The toss balls broke the first day we used it they are very cheap and the sand breaks out easy !
customer_reviews.author: ShanBar

customer_reviews.title: Fun Game
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. Some pieces fit more tightly than others but the carrying case is great too and a perfect size with some room to spare.
customer_reviews.author: Julia M

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Sand coming out of some of the balls when opened the pack Ladder broke after playing one game... joints are breaking After reporting about poor quality... seller refunded the money
customer_reviews.author: Buyer...

customer_reviews.title: So much fun, and very well made
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble. Also sturdy for when you throw balls. Fun for all ages.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Takami

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for a family function last fall and finally got around to opening the box only to find out we are missing pieces! If you order this open right away!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really fun!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Lightweight. Great carrying case. Loads of fun!
customer_reviews.author: Gail Joiner

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality for the Price
customer_reviews.text: I am not a robot. This performed totally to spec. Ordered for a BBQ and got 5 solid hours of play in with no problems and still in good condition. Sturdier than it looked in pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Zeus M.

customer_reviews.title: Missing and wrong pieces.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these as a gift and one was missing a piece and the other had a piece that was too small compared to the other pieces so it was loose and didn’t set up correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Very basic - kinda flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Comes together fairly easy, but also falls apart fairly easy. Rope would come undone with from the balls. Guess not bad for the price and a one time use.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto C Graves

customer_reviews.title: Fun, but falls apart easily
customer_reviews.text: One of the pieces was too thin, so when we connected it, it would fall right out. We fixed it with tape. The bars will separate several time when playing. Does not feel sturdy, falls apart very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Low quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Not very good quality at all for the price. Rubber bands were missing as well as the extra balls. The strings get tangled very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Baril

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality. Wide base to alleviate tipping over easily
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality. Wide base to alleviate tipping over easily.
customer_reviews.author: donna barsalou

customer_reviews.title: Super Fun but Need help Keeping them Up
customer_reviews.text: We love our purchase. We have a lot of fun with the ball toss but I withheld one star because the stakes aren't deep enough. We have to add bean bags to keep the stand up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Was a hit during camping. Slight cons, but fixable
customer_reviews.text: Setup is not so bad. Just need to follow instructions. The only problem is that the stakes that secure the game to the ground are flimsy. Will need to find a solution for this, otherwise good concept
customer_reviews.author: theodore atienza

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Grand kids went wild playing this game and really enjoyed the rousing competition.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Piece Missing
customer_reviews.text: Received this set yesterday with one piece missing. Would like the one piece sent to me if possible. Otherwise, I will need to return and replace.
customer_reviews.author: AMFDavies

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Recieved this item and one of the ladders is missing a part. We can only use 1 ladder
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: You get what you paid for
customer_reviews.text: It worked but some of the pipes didn’t match up leaving gaps in between connections.
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Fun to play!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble and the balls catch on the bars nicely. My kids love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really liked it.
customer_reviews.text: This is a really fun game and easy for all ages.
customer_reviews.author: Nelda

customer_reviews.title: Ok but was missing a part
customer_reviews.text: Almost finished assembling 2nd target and discovered it was missing grey elbow.
customer_reviews.author: veronica chen

customer_reviews.title: Fun game
customer_reviews.text: This was a good purchase. The game was fun and easy to assemble. The one downfall is the pieces do not stay secure when moving it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Tubes don't fit T-connectors properly, keeps falling apart. Balls are sand filled, plugs pop out and sand drains out.
customer_reviews.author: LAD

customer_reviews.title: Cheap plastic!
customer_reviews.text: Cheap plastic! This broke the first time we used it
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Conover

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made.
customer_reviews.text: Fell apart in one use. Balls came off string. Cheap. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Norton

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Missing pieces.. pipe is a weird size so you can’t even buy replacement parts. Would NEVER buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It broke during the 2nd time we played it. ...
customer_reviews.text: It broke during the 2nd time we played it. The rope came off the ball, and then the ladder kept coming undone everytime the ball hit one of the bars
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: Missing a long gray pole to complete second game set
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Barker

customer_reviews.title: Quality control needed.
customer_reviews.text: Missing pieces needed for a weekend engagement party. Too late to order another. Quality control needed
customer_reviews.author: R. Nalick

product_meta.title: MAGGIFT Ladder Toss Game Set for Indoor or Outdoor with 6 Bolas, Carrying Case
product_meta.description:
The Ladder Toss Game Set is made from premium PVC material, safe use.
Simple to assemble and each target joins together to construct a frame, which measures 40 by 24 inches when fully assembled.
Includes built in score rule so you can easily keep score and focus on having fun.
Lightweight and includes a convenient carrying case so you can take it to anywhere.
Perfect for backyard, beach, tailgate parties, camping or terrace. Great game to get the entire family outside together.

Note:
satisfaction guaranteed. If you have any problems, please feel free to contact us.
feature_bullets: Includes 2 premium targets, 6 bolas (3 Yellow + 3 Blue), carrying case and instructions / rules.
Great ladder toss game for indoors or outdoors to get the entire family together.
Simple to assemble in minutes, no tools required.
Lightweight ladder toss game, the carrying bag is included for easy transport and storage.
PVC pipes create target framework, which measures 40 x 24 inch.
